Vision of God.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Inner Vision.quote: "The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Spiritual Sight.quote: "The eyes of your understanding being enlightened." (Ephesians 1:18)

Divine Perception.quote: "What is invisible to the outer eye, becomes visible to the inner eye of wisdom." (Upanishads)

Third Eye.quote: "When your eye is single, your whole body will be full of light." (Luke 11:34)

Sacred Seeing.quote: "The universe is the opening of a vision." (Sri Aurobindo)

Transcendent Vision.quote: "No vision can grasp Him, but His grasp is over all vision." (Quran 6:103)

Prophetic Vision.quote: "Your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams." (Acts 2:17)

Divine Revelation.quote: "Now we see through a glass darkly, but then face to face." (1 Corinthians 13:12)

Spiritual Insight.quote: "The eye with which one sees the Reality has to be inner, subtle and divine." (Ibn Arabi)

Universal Vision.quote: "See the Self in all beings and all beings in the Self." (Bhagavad Gita 6:29)

Divine Darshan.quote: "The vision of the Divine destroys all karmas." (Yoga Vasistha)

Enlightened Perception.quote: "When the eye is untroubled, the result is it sees clearly." (Tao Te Ching 35)

Sacred Gaze.quote: "Look with your heart and not with your eyes." (Rumi)

Celestial Vision.quote: "The pure in heart see the divine in everything." (Ramakrishna)

Divine Witness.quote: "Be still and know that I am God." (Psalm 46:10)

Spiritual Eyes.quote: "The light of the body is the eye." (Matthew 6:22)

Divine Perspective.quote: "See God in all and all in God." (Vedanta)

Divine Recognition.quote: "Those who know with their eyes shut are aware of the spiritual light." (Kabir)

Mystic Vision.quote: "Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others." (Jonathan Swift)

Inner Sight.quote: "The eyes of the heart see what physical eyes cannot." (Sufi saying)

Divine Awareness.quote: "When the doors of perception are cleansed, everything appears as it is - infinite." (William Blake)

Spiritual Vision.quote: "One who sees everything as divine transforms everything they see." (Vedantic teaching)
